@Cooltrain - this mod used the Lockpick to make it possible to lock houses and give them a code. It require a masterLock Pick to enable a house to be locked and then it has functionality to prevent that brute force is used. if the code is entered in correct 3 times there is a 15 minute cooldown. 4. Doors locked with code or without it will remain locked / closed after server restart. (Fixed persistence issue with mod here).
5. You can unlock any code locked door with "LockPickMaster" item at any time.
6. Door lockout. After 5 failed attempts to unlock door it will be locked for 15 minutes and play alert sound.
7. Sounds. Sounds when interacting with door via the mod.
